metadata.title: CVE-2021-32644 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Ampache is an open source web based audio/video streaming application andfile manager. Due to a lack of input filtering versions 4.x.y arevulnerable to code injection in random.php. The attack requires userauthentication to access the random.php page unless the site is running indemo mode. This issue has been resolved in 4.4.3.

criterions.comment: ampache package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
